critique: This document is a directive from the President to the Secretary of the Interior regarding the classification of positions within the Department of the Interior. It pertains to the civil service and the inclusion of specific roles (chief clerk and assistant chief clerk at the Indian warehouse in New York) within the department's classification. There is no information about ideological tilt, immigration, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, and social inclusion. Therefore, all axes should be scored as neutral.
